short.ar: تسجيل دخول واحد الى تطبيق الانترنت باستخدام ‏‎IBM Security Access Manager for Enterprise Single Sign-on‎‏.
short.am,bg,bn,ca,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_4: Single sign-on to web applications with IBM Security Access Manager for Enterprise Single Sign-on.
short.cs: Jednotné přihlášení do webových aplikací pomocí produktu IBM Security Access Manager for Enterprise Single Sign-on.
short.da: Enkelt logon til webapplikationer med IBM Security Access Manager for Enterprise Single Sign-on.
short.de: Verwenden Sie IBM Security Access Manager for Enterprise Single Sign-on, um sich über Single Sign-on bei Webanwendungen anzumelden.
short.es: Inicie una única sesión en las aplicaciones web con IBM Security Access Manager for Enterprise Single Sign-on.
short.fi: Kertakirjautuminen Web-sovelluksiin IBM Security Access Manager for Enterprise Single Sign-on -palvelun avulla.
short.fr: Connexion unique aux applications Web avec IBM Security Access Manager for Enterprise Single Sign-on.
short.he: התחברות בזהות יחידה ליישומי רשת באמצעות IBM Security Access Manager for Enterprise Single Sign-on.
short.hu: Egypontos bejelentkezés webalkalmazásokba az IBM Security Access Manager for Enterprise Single Sign-on használatával.
short.it: SSO (Single sign-on) alle applicazioni web con IBM Security Access Manager for Enterprise Single Sign-on.
short.ja: IBM Security Access Manager for Enterprise Single Sign-On による Web アプリケーションへのシングル・サインオン。
short.ko: IBM Security Access Manager for Enterprise Single Sign-on을 사용하여 웹 애플리케이션에 싱글 사인온합니다.
short.nl: Enkelvoudige aanmelding bij webtoepassingen met IBM Security Access Manager for Enterprise Single Sign-on.
short.pl: Pojedyncze logowanie do aplikacji WWW przy użyciu produktu IBM Security Access Manager for Enterprise Single Sign-on.
short.pt_BR: Conexão única para aplicativos da web com o IBM Security Access Manager for Enterprise Single Sign-on.
short.ru: Единая регистрация в веб-приложениях посредством IBM Security Access Manager for Enterprise Single Sign-on.
short.zh_CN: 使用 IBM Security Access Manager for Enterprise Single Sign-on 单点登录到 Web 应用程序。
short.zh_TW: 使用 IBM Security Access Manager for Enterprise Single Sign-on 單一登入 Web 應用程式。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is a component of IBM Security Access Manager for Enterprise Single Sign-on and provides single sign-on to web applications. It eliminates the need to remember and manage passwords with automatic logon and password change for web applications.
